version_description:
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Workplace Chat features. Thanks for using Workplace Chat!
This version includes performance improvements.
Thanks for using Workplace Chat! Every update of the app includes improvements to speed and reliability. As other new features become available, we’ll highlight those for you in the app.

We've redesigned Workplace Chat making it simpler to navigate and easier to get work done! This version's changes include:
• A new design and simpler layout with tabs for Chats & People.
• Several bug fixes and performance improvements.
• And to add a bit of fun, you can now customize the color of your chat threads.

• A new design and simpler layout with tabs for Chats & People.
• Several bug fixes and performance improvements.
• And to add a bit of fun, you can now customize the color of your chat threads.

Thanks for using Workplace Chat. To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.
Improvements and bug fixes in this version include:
• Added support for Pinned Messages and Saved Messages
• Added ability to view contact details
• Added support for sending an image via drag and drop on iPad
• Fixed an issue where call audio would not play when answered from the lock screen
• Fixed sound effect inconsistencies throughout the app
• Improved login compatibility with the Workplace app
• Improved protection to prevent spoofing websites in the In-App-Browser
